title: As setbacks mount and injuries multiply, it’s difficult to believe in these Mariners
text:
As setbacks mount and injuries multiply, it’s difficult to believe in these Mariners
-
- Updated
[0](/sports/professional_sports/mariners/as-setbacks-mount-and-injuries-multiply-it-s-difficult-to-believe-in-these-mariners/image_79be520f-da8c-5232-9e1d-21fb8fdee985.html#comments)
As featured on
The flawed and flailing Mariners remain in the hunt. But as setbacks mount, and injuries multiply, it’s increasingly difficult to believe in this group.
